attributes.action: Give the electorate of the UK by referendum the opportunity of choosing, as they do in the USA the leader of our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the days of a few individuals choosing who leads the Government of the day are well overdue for a change. The means of holding a Referendum via the internet are readily available as we can now vote in local and general elections online
